original_text: And one went out into the field to gather herbs, and found a wild vine, and gathered thereof wild gourds his lap full, and came and shred them into the pot of pottage: for they knew them not.
korean_text: 한 사람이 채소를 캐러 들에 나가 들포도덩굴을 만나 그것에서 들호박을 따서 옷자락에 채워가지고 돌아와 썰어 국 끓이는 솥에 넣되 그들은 무엇인지 알지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: And one went out into the field
and gathered thereof wild gourds his lap full
sentences.korean_translation: 그것에서 들호박을 그의 옷자락에 가득 모았고

sentences.original_text: and came and shred them into the pot of pottage
